body: Once per day, you cast your psyche into the void of space to attract the attention of a terrible otherworldly being. The dweller in darkness behaves in all ways as if you had cast phantasmal killer. At 17th level, the dweller in darkness can be perceived by more than one creature, as if you had cast weird. You must be at least 11th level to choose this revelation.
name: Dweller in Darkness
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Oracle/Mysteries/Dark Tapestry/Revelations/Dweller in Darkness
